1. Holi is the time to unwind, de-stress and bond with sweets, thandai and colours. Let's rejuvenate by immersing ourselves in the colours of joy. Happy Holi!!


2. May you have the most blessed holi festival than you ever had. May it be full of fun,joy and love. May you be as colorful as the festival itself or even more. Lets all have lots of fun.


3. Bright colors, water balloons, lavish gujiyas and melodious songs' are the ingredients of perfect Holi. Wish you a very happy and wonderful Holi. 

4. Holi tyohar hai Rang aur Bhaang ka Hum sab yaaron ka Ghar mein aaye mehmano ka Gali mein gali walon ka Mohalle mein mahoul waalo ka Desh mein deshwalo ka. 

5. May the colours of Holi bring colours to your life and enhance the vibrant personality you have.Enjoy the festive spirit. Happy Holi. 

6. I wish you a Holi filled with sweet moments and colourful memories to cherish forever. Happy Holi. 

7. May you have the most blessed holi festival than you ever had. May it be full of fun,joy and love. May you be as colorful as the festival itself or even more. Lets all have lots of fun. 

8. 'Bright colors, water balloons, lavish gujiyas and melodious songs' are the ingredients of perfect Holi. Wish you a very happy and wonderful Holi. 

9. May God gift you all the colours of life, colours of joy, colours of happiness, colours of friendship, colours of love and all other colours you want to paint your life in. Happy Holi. 

10. Neela, peela, hara, gulaabi yeh sab to ek bahaana hain hame to tumse milne aana hai Es Holi pe unhe rangne jaana hain.. Dil ne ek baar phir humara kahna mana hain. 

11. A little wish for you on the auspicious occasion of Holi. May you always be healthy, contented and happy. Wishing you and your family a happy Holi.
